global.title: Shenzhen Hengyunchang Vacuum Technology Co., Ltd.
global.description: Shenzhen Hengyunchang Vacuum Technology Co., Ltd., established on March 19, 2013, specializes in the technical development, consultation, and sales of vacuum equipment, vacuum plasma power supplies, new energy materials, semiconductor devices, gas mass flow meters, vacuum pumps, cathodes, targets, and electromechanical products.
global.author: Hengyunchang Team
global.creator: shonh@ablazec.com

values.title: Our Core Values
values.innovationDesc: We constantly push boundaries to create groundbreaking solutions.
values.qualityDesc: Excellence in everything we do, from concept to execution.
values.integrityDesc: Honesty and ethical behavior guide all our decisions.
values.customerDesc: We prioritize understanding and exceeding client expectations.

2010.title: Company Founded
2010.desc: We began our journey with a small team of visionaries in a garage.

2013.title: First Product Launch
2013.desc: Our revolutionary product changed the industry landscape overnight.

2016.title: Global Expansion
2016.desc: We opened offices in five continents to serve our international clients.

2019.title: Innovation Center
2019.desc: Established our state-of-the-art R&D facility to accelerate innovation.

2022.title: New Headquarters
2022.desc: Moved to our custom-built campus designed for collaboration and creativity.

innovation.title: Culture of Innovation
innovation.description: We foster an environment where creative thinking is encouraged and rewarded. Our innovation lab allows employees to explore cutting-edge ideas without constraints.

quality.title: Commitment to Quality
quality.description: Quality is non-negotiable at our company. We have implemented rigorous testing protocols and quality assurance measures throughout our workflow.

integrity.title: Integrity in Everything
integrity.description: We maintain the highest ethical standards in all business dealings. Our transparent practices have earned us trust and long-term partnerships.

responsibility.title: Social Responsibility
responsibility.description: We actively contribute to community development and environmental sustainability. Our CSR initiatives have positively impacted over 100,000 lives globally.
